resources.string: Please, insert SD card into the phone!
Show in notification bar after each recorded call
Without Ads and with additional features
All your further calls will be saved.
Tap on a contact photo to select an item.

Pro version contains: 
 - Share recordings 
 - Dropbox sync 
 - Google Drive sync 
 - Advanced notifications 
 - No more Ads
Protect your recordings with passcode authentication every time you start the app
Delete all recordings from this device after 10 failed passcode attempts
The passcodes did not match. Please, try again!
Synchronize only when connected to WiFi
You are trying to run the Free version of Call Recorder but have already installed the Pro one. Would you like to go with the Pro?
Looks like some problem occurred during the last recording. If this message appears again then, please, try to change File format or Audio source in the Settings.
Help us with translation to your native language
Unable to write to external storage.
Allow to write to removable SD card
All recordings older then selected days period will be deleting automatically
It will delete all recordings if uninstall the Call Recorder application
No player app found to play this audio
Use external media player to play recordings

If this option Enabled then it will not be possible to automaticaly import recordings to Pro version. Furthermore, do backup of all important recordings if you decide to uninstall the app, as all they will be deleted.

If this option Enabled and you decide to uninstall the app, you have to do backup of all important recordings, as all they will be deleted and it will not be possible to automaticaly import recordings after installing the app again.

Simple Call Recorder application that has an ability to: - Enable/Disable call recording - Records all your phone calls - Play/Stop recorded audio by touch on the item - Delete recorded items - Lock recorded items to prevent from auto-cleaning - Share recorded items (only in Pro version) - Confirmation dialog: Would you like to keep recorded call that is shown just after the call (only in Pro version).
IF IT DOES NOT WORK ON YOUR PHONE AT ALL OR IT DOES NOT RECORD OPPOSITE SIDE VOICE CLEARLY: 1. Try to mix different recording settings as it described here: http://clevermobile.net/products/call-recorder/call-recorder-settings-configuration-instructions/ 2. There is a limitation for some phones that don't support recording from phone line or bluetooth. Itâ€™s audio driver problem made by manufacturer of the phone. List of known supported devices and configurations for them is here: http://clevermobile.net/products/call-recorder/call-recorder-supported-phones-and-configurations-for-them/ Please, not give bad marks for that. Thank you!
If you have some suggestions or comments, please visit our site http://clevermobile.net and feel free to contact us.

This application does not work for some phones. So, please, try our free version before buying this one. If free version does not work for your phone - don't waste your money for buying Pro!
*** TURN RECORDING OFF IN FREE VERSION JUST AFTER PRO IS INSTALLED ***
Pro version of Call Recorder without Ads and includes additional features.
Pro version of Call Recorder application has an ability to: - Enable/Disable call recording - Records all your phone calls - Play/Stop recorded audio by touch on the item - Delete recorded items - Lock recorded items to prevent from auto-cleaning - Share selected recordings (Only in Pro) - Synchronization with Dropbox and Google Drive (Only in Pro) - Confirmation dialog after each call: Save recording? (Only in Pro)
If you want to have it in your language and ready help with translation - you are welcome! Please, visit translation page here: http://translate.clevermobile.net/projects/call-recorder/translations/
If you have some suggestions or comments, please visit our site http://clevermobile.net and feel free to contact us.
